measured_by: choice between “Cooperate” vs “Not cooperate” in a one-shot Prisoner’s Dilemma Game
justification: Participants completed a one-shot framed PDG where they had to choose either “Cooperate” or “Not cooperate”, and the authors treat this behavioral choice as the measure of cooperative behaviour.

measured_by: 10-point Likert agreement with statement about concern for those with less money
justification: “Using a 10-item Likert scale, we asked participants if they agreed with the statement ‘I do not care about how much money I have; what concerns me is that there are people who have less money than I have’.”

measured_by: 10-point Likert agreement with statement about concern for those with more money
justification: For envy the same Likert format was used: participants rated agreement with ‘I do not care about how much money I have; what concerns me is that there are people who have more money than I have’.”
